name: Run Back in Time
fullSentence: For you, a thousand times over.
description: An audiovisual work about time, cycles, death transactions and love. Created using Unity.
content:
"Would you be willing to go back to the past even at the cost of sacrificing your life?"

Unless it is for something more important than life.

In the endless looping of time and space, they keep making that unhesitating choice.

An audiovisual work about time, cycles, death transactions and love.

Created using Unity.
